headline.main: BIG JUMP IN PACIFIC; Americans Surprise Foe, Seize Bay on Largest Solomons Island

lead_paragraph: GUADALCANAL, Tuesday, Nov. 2 -- Green-clad United States Marines swarmed ashore from landing craft early yesterday against fortified Japanese positions at Empress Augusta Bay on the west side of Bougainville Island in the biggest single Allied landing in this theatre.
abstract: US marines take Empress Augusta Bay, Bougainville; Jap cruiser force flees; Jap positions on southern Bougainville, Shortland and Treasury Islands and Choiseul by-passed; MacArthur explains strategy; US-NZ forces take Jap mortar guns, Treasury Islands; US paratroops gain, Choiseul; Allied planes raid Kieta and Buka; map
